EmailTemplate.description: Email automatically issued when a SAR form is raised
EmailTemplate.name: Suspicion Report Acknowledged
EmailTemplate.subject: Your SAR has been logged with FCU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your referral.
Please note: Your Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) has been logged with FCU Your case reference is - Your case subject is:
Your SAR will be investigated within the approved time frames.
Kind regards,
FCU Team
